seo.title: Corniglia Events 2025 | Festivals & Local Celebrations
seo.description: Annual events and festivals in Corniglia. Wine harvest, patron saint festivals, local traditions, and seasonal celebrations.

body.title: Festivals & Celebrations
body.subtitle: Experience authentic local traditions, wine harvest festivals, and patron saint celebrations.

features.title: Grape Harvest (Sept-Oct)
features.description: Celebrate the vendemmia with local wine producers. Taste new wine and experience ancient traditions.

features.title: Feast of San Pietro (June 29)
features.description: Patron saint festival with religious procession, music, fireworks, and community dinner.

features.title: Lemon Festival (May)
features.description: Celebrate Ligurian lemons with food stalls, tastings, and traditional recipes.

features.title: Summer Concerts (Jul-Aug)
features.description: Evening concerts in the main square. Classical music, jazz, and Italian folk performances.

features.title: Luminaria (Aug 15)
features.description: Ferragosto celebration with candles, lights, and evening festivities throughout the village.

features.title: Christmas Market (Dec)
features.description: Small but charming holiday market with local crafts, food specialties, and mulled wine.
